text:
Emanuel Ungaro (13 February 1933 – 22 December 2019) was a French fashion designer.
Ungaro launched his first menswear collection, Ungaro Uomo, in 1973, and his first perfume, "Diva", 10 years later in 1983. Ungaro was a participant in The Battle of Versailles Fashion Show held on November 28, 1973. Later followed the perfumes "Senso" (1987), "Ungaro" (1991) and "Emanuel Ungaro For Men" (1991).
Ungaro died in Paris on 22 December 2019 at the age of 86.

annotations.surface_form: The Battle of Versailles Fashion Show
